title: The Waiting
author: Claire, Regi
snippet: As I amble homewards on the short-cropped grass, I suddenly  glimpse Rachel. Black coat tails whipping out behind her, she is  running across the bottom of the Links towards Melville Drive,  pursued by someone that looks oddly familiar. Drainpipe jeans,  puffed-up jacket.

title: The Waiting
author: Claire, Regi
snippet: Rather than traipse round the park in the twilight and risk  another encounter with the Hawk, I head over to Melville Drive  and what used to be my digs on Gladstone Terrace. No litter here  for my scavenger, merely a straight line of frost-webbed maples  and garden walls, perfect for leg-cockings.
